description:
✨ Hey there, dreamers and doers ✨

At Based, we're on a mission to revolutionize the way people interact with their surroundings by letting users share content, digital assets, and experiences at locations around the world for others to discover. We like to think of it as the "PokemonGo for content." By bridging our digital and physical worlds, we’re creating a digital tapestry of human experiences, waiting to be discovered, collected, and unlocked through shared in-person experiences. But we're not just building an app; we're cultivating a movement—a community of passionate individuals who believe in the power of technology to foster real-world connections and create meaningful experiences. We're seeking pioneers, innovators, and dreamers who aren't afraid to challenge the status quo, who want to be part of something bigger than themselves, and rewrite the social experience for generations to come. As a Strategic Partnerships Intern, you'll be at the forefront of our mission to revolutionize the way people interact with their surroundings.

   Role Overview:

As a Strategic Partnerships Intern, you'll play a pivotal role in identifying and nurturing potential partnerships with brands, businesses, and creators. Your responsibilities will include:
• Deep diving into understanding cultural trends across Gen Z and Millennials, spotting emerging trends, and identifying creators, brands, and businesses that resonate with these demographics.
• Developing a keen understanding of the evolving digital landscape, staying abreast of new platforms, content formats, and consumption habits relevant to both creators and businesses.
• Conducting extensive research to identify potential partnership opportunities within our target markets, leveraging your insights into cultural trends and consumer behaviors across diverse industries.
• Proactively reaching out to prospects and nurturing leads, articulating our value proposition and fostering meaningful relationships with both brands and creators.
• Organizing and facilitating meetings with potential partners, showcasing a deep understanding of their brand values, business objectives, and strategic priorities.
• Actively participating in networking events, both online and offline, to expand our reach and establish valuable connections within the industry.
• Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to develop tailored partnership strategies that drive engagement, reach, and brand affinity for both creators and businesses.
• Assisting in the negotiation and execution of partnership agreements, ensuring alignment of objectives and mutual benefit for all stakeholders.
• Continuously tracking and analyzing partnership performance metrics, identifying areas for optimization and growth across brand and business partnerships.
• Requirements:

   Requirements:

We're seeking a dynamic and resourceful individual with a passion for cultural trends and digital innovation. Ideal candidates will demonstrate
• A deep understanding of cultural trends, particularly among Gen Z and Millennials, and a proven ability to spot emerging trends and influencers across diverse industries.
• Strong research and analytical skills, with the ability to synthesize complex information and draw actionable insights relevant to both brands and creators.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with diverse stakeholders including brands, businesses, and creators.
• Proactive mindset and self-starter mentality, with the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment.
• A genuine passion for innovation and creativity, with a keen eye for identifying partnership opportunities that drive meaningful impact for all parties involved.
• Prior experience in marketing, partnerships, or related fields is preferred but not required.
• Salary: Internship with Equity Options

   Compensation (Unpaid):

Joining us as a Strategic Partnerships Intern means more than just gaining valuable experience; it's an opportunity to make a tangible impact and shape the future of our company. While this is not a paid internship, we like to think being a part of a fast paced and exciting new startup revolutionizing the social space makes up for it. In addition, exceptional interns may qualify for a future full-time equity-based and paid positions, providing you with a stake in our success and aligning your future with ours.

If you're ready to dive into the exciting world of strategic partnerships and help us unlock new opportunities, then we invite you to join our team. Together, let's build a future where collaborations know no bounds.

Apply now for the Strategic Partnerships Internship at Based. Let's shape the future together.
